name: 2nd Time
description:
Two Minutes Dungeon Runner. 

It is a dungeon running game where you have two minutes to do as much as possible while struggling through various levels and reach the end.

 Battle monsters, collect coins and keep track of the time limit on the corner! 

Note: This was the product of a GameJam, so it is not fully polished (May be further developed in the future, if the interest is there)
